description: Gets a list of the file shares for a specific S3 File Gateway, or the list of file shares that belong to the calling Amazon Web Services account. This operation is only supported for S3 File Gateways.

nested_items.name: Marker
nested_items.description: If the request includes Marker, the response returns that value in this field.

nested_items.name: NextMarker
nested_items.description: If a value is present, there are more file shares to return. In a subsequent request, use NextMarker as the value for Marker to retrieve the next set of file shares.

nested_items.name: FileShareInfoList
nested_items.description: An array of information about the S3 File Gateway's file shares.

nested_items.name: FileShareType
nested_items.description: The type of the file share.

nested_items.name: FileShareARN
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the file share.

nested_items.name: FileShareId
nested_items.description: The ID of the file share.

nested_items.name: FileShareStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the file share.

nested_items.name: GatewayARN
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the gateway. Use the  ListGateways operation to return a list of gateways for your account and Amazon Web Services Region.
